title: Sea View 2BHK in Palm Jumeirah Marina
metaTitle: Sea View 2BHK Palm Jumeirah | Dubai Apartments
metaDescription: Enjoy a sea view 2BHK in Palm Jumeirah Marina, Dubai. Fully furnished apartment with beach access, premium amenities, and luxurious stay.
description: Nestled on the iconic Palm Jumeirah, Marina Residence 2, this exquisite two-Bedroom apartment one the most prestigious buildings on Palm Jumeirah, located at the very top of the trunk.

space.kitchen: Fully Equipped kitchen with dishwasher, fridge microwave, cooking utensils, toaster, fridge, cooktop etc.
space.living: Beautiful views in day and night. sunny room with clean bed linen and quiet and clean apartment.

title: Bright and Spacious 2BR - Dorra Bay
metaDescription: Stay in a bright and spacious 2BR apartment at Dorra Bay, Dubai. Fully furnished with pools nearby and easy access to JBR Beach.
description: Welcome to your all in one and perfect retreat in the hear of Dubai Marina! This spacious 2-bedroom apartment is in the Iconic Dorra Bay Tower. -6-min walk to JBR Beach. -Dubai Marina Walk, offering direct access to the cafes, restaurants, and retail outlets. -Offers the views of the Dubai Marina yacht canal, the Arabian Gulf, the Palm Jumeirah, and the city skyline. -A state-of-the-art gymnasium. -A spacious swimming pool. -Landscaped gardens and dedicated children's play areas.

title: Modern 2BR Retreat with Infinity Pool in Urban Oasis
metaTitle: Modern 2BR with Infinity Pool | Dubai Apartments
metaDescription: Enjoy a modern 2BR retreat in Urban Oasis with infinity pool, fully furnished interiors, and convenient Dubai location for your stay.
description: This 2BR apartment is designed for those who crave both sophistication and peace. Urban Oasis by Missoni offer a luxurious lifestyle with a range of top-tier amenities.

space.kitchen: Fully equipped with kitchen utensils, crockery, cutlery, toaster, kettle, and microwave for all your culinary needs.
space.living: Master Bedroom: One queen-size double bed with side tables, built-in wardrobes, and ambient lighting, offering stunning views of Dubai. Second bedroom: One queen-size double bed, ideal for families or friends. Bathrooms: One bathroom with essential amenities. Living Area: Cozy sitting area with 1 sofa bed, a console table, and 65 inches, smart Tv for your entertainment. Dining Area: A spacious dining table for 6 people to enjoy meals together. Balcony: Spacious balcony with outdoor seating, a table, and a swing with incredible views of Dubai Marina.
space.facilities: Infinity pool with breathtaking views of Dubai skyline Â· Terrace with seating and canal views Â· Fully equipped fitness centre Â· Elegant lounge areas for socialising or relaxing Â· Private parking for your vehicle Â· High-speed internet and air conditioning Â· Washer-dryer, iron, ironing board, and vacuum cleaner Â· In residential Facilities the building provides access to a modern gym, outdoor pool with stunning views, spa and other premium amenities for guests

rules: In accordance with DTCM requirements we will need a copy of each guest passport prior to arrival for submission to the Dubai Tourism Board.
Upon arrival please present your passports to the building reception staff for verification.

A REFUNDABLE SECURITY DEPOSIT OF 1000 AED IS REQUIRED BEFORE ARRIVAL. THIS DEPOSIT WILL BE FULLY REFUNDED AT CHECKOUT AFTER INSPECTION OF THE APARTMENT, PROVIDED NO DAMAGE/LOST OF THE CARDS HAS OCCURRED.
